situation: A cantilever beam has a height "h" equal to 1/8 of the length "L". It carries a uniform load over the entire span. The beam is a steel wide flange section with E=28x10<sup>6</sup>psi and has an allowable bending stress of 17500 psi in both tension and compression.

subquestions.question: Calculate the ratio of the deflection at the free end to the length, assuming that the beam carries the maximum allowable load.
